alert.note: Alert for Aguadilla; Isabela; Moca; Quebradillas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 3:50PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Aguadilla, Isabela, Moca, and Quebradillas, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 500 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 249 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Isabela, Moca, Aguadilla, Quebradillas, Aceitunas, Caban, San Antonio, Mora, Rafael Hernandez and Cacao. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
